original_title: Banking system will not be burdened, EPF funds will not be touched: CB Governor
original_body_lines: The Central Bank Governor Dr. Nandalal Weerasinghe said the banking system would not be burdened any further as it already contributes to the Treasury and economy through taxes of over 50%.
The President's Media Division said the Governor assured that the 57 million depositors would be protected.
Meanwhile, the Governor assured that the EPF funds already accumulated would not be touched and also guaranteed a minimum 9% interest on the EPF.
